name: лабиринт
description:
In  " лабиринт", you have to play with a friend to explore the falling maze : one of you have to make path from falling tetromino while the other one are going to explore and fight many monsters. Go after all the treasure of this maze but be careful to not kill your ally by making a line of tetrominos.

Made in the Epic Game Jam (45h)

Issa BARBIER - code, game design
Ivan GULIZIA - graph, artistic director
Mouna OMAR - graph, UI
Horace RIBOUT - code
